text: 28|50|umakku avarkal patil collavitil, niccayamaka avarkal tankal carira iccaiyaiye pinparrukirarkal enru urutiyaka nir arintu kolviraka. Allahvutaiya nerana valiyai tavirttu vittut tan carira iccaiyaip pinparrupavanai vita valikettavan evanumunto! Niccayamaka allah (ittakaiya) aniyayakkara makkalai nerana valiyil celuttuvatillai
